title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions: Introducing the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! This diecast vehicle pack includes 5 Batwheels characters in a 1:55 scale Batcast Metal diecast format. The set features Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. With working wheels, simply push to send these characters racing into action! These vehicles are perfect for imaginative play and storytelling for preschool kids ages 3 and up. For even more racing stunt action, pair these vehicles with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave (playset sold separately). Get ready for epic Super Hero versus Super-Villain racing with Fisher-Price Batwheels!

Each vehicle is made with authentic Batwheels styling and Batcast Metal die-cast materials. The set includes 5 characters in 1:55 scale format, including Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. With working wheels, your little ones can push these vehicles into action and let the racing begin! Encourage imaginative play and storytelling with these Batwheels, perfect for preschool kids ages 3 years and older. For even more racing stunt action, bring these vehicles to the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave (playset sold separately). Don't miss out on the excitement - bring home the Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack today!

Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.
